title: Relates to the payment of medical malpractice insurance premiums and creates the health care access protection fund
summary: Relates to the payment of medical malpractice insurance premiums and creates the health care access protection fund.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 266 of the laws of 1986 amending the civil practice law and rules and other laws relating to malpractice and professional medical conduct; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the health care access protection fund; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to the payment of medical malpractice insurance premiums
